about_the_game:
StellarX is a user-friendly, AI-enabled platform that lets you create immersive experiences in VR and Mixed Reality - without code. From simple environments to complex interactive scenarios, StellarX lets you give life to scenarios in 3D.

StellarX has already driven the digital transformation efforts of giants such as Nikon, ArcelorMittal, Northwell Health, the Government of Canada, and more.

    
No need to know anything about coding to use StellarX. Create short scenarios and complex storylines with its intuitive visual Canvas. Set up triggers, interactions and behaviors in a heartbeat, all by connecting nodes.

Get started with some of our provided template Spaces, or jump into an empty Space and build from scratch. Drag-and-drop various objects from our provided asset collections, or import 3D objects you’ve created or found on Sketchfab. Add in videos, and even sound that StellarX will spatialize. Everything is customizable and can be made interactive—so, jump in!! 


Speaking of 3D objects, you can search for and import assets from Sketchfab directly in the StellarX Web Portal, making them instantly available for you to use in your Space. The Web Portal is a centralized place for you to manage all of your 3D, video, and audio content. 

Let it rain, burn or smoke with Particles, add interactions, or co-create with AI using voice commands. StellarX lets you create experiences that enable more than just watching. 

Join collaborators in real-time inside your immersive world of choice. Meet, iterate, create, or simply experience a virtual world together.

Take a step further into immersion with StellarX’s Mixed Reality functionalities. Gain assistance on real life tasks, boost situational awareness, elevate sensory experiences, and more.

Conversational AI Agents make your experience fuller by answering questions, conversing with players to give more context, and by transferring knowledge specific to your use-case (Agents are in Beta Testing). NPCs are customizable avatars that deliver pre-scripted dialogue and movements, bringing your vision to life. Available on paid plans.

Immersive technologies are transforming entire industries as we speak, empowering individuals to better themselves and to create without bounds. From safety training to healthcare treatment, virtual classrooms, predictive maintenance, and more—anything is possible with StellarX!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

StellarX has a few subscription plans based on your needs. You can get started on our Free plan or explore our website for other plans that come with more features and personalized support.

Powered by OVA, StellarX was put forward with help from the Canada Media Fund (CMF)

name: StellarX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card Directx 11 compatible
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card Directx 11 compatible

short_description: StellarX empowers you to create collaborative simulations in Virtual and Mixed Reality without code. Simply drag-and-drop, grab and go or co-create with AI. Building immersive experiences has never been so easy!
